text: Sophora is a genus of about 45 species of small trees and shrubs. It is in the subfamily Faboideae of the pea family Fabaceae. Many students see Sophora as three genera: Sophora, Calia (S. secundiflora) and Styphnolobium (S. japonica). ==Related pages== * Sophora davidii * Sophora macnabiana * Kowhai *MƒÅmane Category:Faboideae Category:Trees
title: Sophora
